prerequisite: YSC2209 Proof or permission of instructor (Experience with mathematical proof-writing and set theory, equivalent to that of the pre-requisite Proof course)
moduleDescription: This course embarks on a deep study of the real numbers and functions of a single real variable. Fundamental properties of real numbers – arithmetic, distance, limit, convergence, order – are developed from scratch. From there, the course delves into the inner workings of calculus, the general notions of continuity, differentiability, measure, and integration, for functions of one real variable.
